mapper.select: select num, userid, gCode, gName, gPrice, gSize, gColor, gAmount, gImage from cart where num = #{num}
select userid, passwd, username, post, addr1, addr2, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2 from member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo ( num, userid, gCode, gName, gPrice, gSize, gColor, gAmount, gImage, orderName, post, addr1, addr2, phone, payMethod ) values ( orderinfo_seq.nextval, #{userid},#{gCode},#{gName},#{gPrice},#{gSize}, #{gColor},#{gAmount},#{gImage},#{orderName}, #{post},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone},#{payMethod})
